title: Senior Python Engineer
description: DataStream AI is looking for a Senior Python Engineer to scale our real-time data ingestion pipelines. You will work with FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and Redis. Requirements: 5+ years Python experience, proficiency with Docker and Kubernetes, and a background in building ETL pipelines. This is a long-term contract role.

title: Product Designer (UX/UI)
description: FinFlow is a fintech startup revolutionizing personal finance. We need a Product Designer to lead our mobile app redesign. You must have a strong portfolio showcasing Figma skills and user research case studies. Experience in the financial sector is a plus. On-site 3 days a week.

title: DevOps Architect
description: Join our consulting team helping enterprises migrate to AWS. We need an expert in Terraform, CI/CD patterns, and security best practices. You will be responsible for designing resilient infrastructure and mentoring junior engineers. Certifications in AWS Professional or Azure Solutions Architect are preferred.

title: iOS Developer (Swift)
description: SocialSphere is building the next generation of social networking. We are looking for an iOS developer focused on Swift and SwiftUI. You will work on high-performance video rendering and real-time chat features. Requires 3+ years of experience with the iOS SDK and App Store deployment.

title: Customer Success Manager
description: SaaSly is seeking a CSM to manage a portfolio of high-value enterprise clients. You will be the primary point of contact, ensuring renewals and identifying upsell opportunities. Strong communication skills and experience with CRM tools like Salesforce or Gainsight are required.

title: Rust Systems Programmer
description: CoreLayer is building a high-throughput blockchain indexing service. We need a Rust expert to optimize our memory management and concurrency patterns. Knowledge of WebAssembly and distributed systems is a significant advantage. This is a 100% remote position with flexible hours.

title: Data Scientist (NLP)
description: LingoBot is creating AI-driven customer support bots. We need a Data Scientist specialized in Natural Language Processing. Experience with PyTorch, Transformers, and LLM fine-tuning is essential. PhD or Masters in CS/Math preferred. You will work on improving intent classification accuracy.

title: Ruby on Rails Developer
description: ShopCraft is an e-commerce platform for boutique makers. We need a Rails developer to help us scale our marketplace. You'll be working on complex inventory logic and third-party API integrations (Stripe, ShipStation). We value clean code, RSpec testing, and collaborative problem-solving.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Monitor and defend our corporate network against threats. Responsibilities include incident response, vulnerability assessments, and managing SIEM tools. Requirements: CISSP or CEH certification, 2+ years in a SOC environment, and proficiency in Linux and network protocols.

title: Content Marketing Manager
description: GrowthLabs is a B2B marketing agency. We need a storyteller to lead our content strategy. You will produce blog posts, white papers, and social media campaigns for our tech clients. Must have 4+ years of experience in B2B SaaS marketing and a proven track record of driving organic traffic.

title: Vue.js Front-end Developer
description: CreativeHub is an asset management tool for designers. We are migrating our dashboard to Vue 3 and Vite. We need a developer who loves building slick, interactive UIs with Tailwind CSS and Pinia. Experience with Canvas or SVG manipulation is a plus for our image editor features.

title: Quality Assurance Lead
description: Lead our QA department in establishing automated testing frameworks. We use Cypress for E2E and Jest for unit tests. You will define the testing strategy, manage a team of 4 manual testers, and ensure all releases meet our high-quality standards. 5+ years in QA required.

title: Golang Backend Engineer
description: StreamFast provides low-latency video streaming APIs. We need a Gopher to work on our media processing engine. Knowledge of FFmpeg, gRPC, and microservices architecture is required. You should be comfortable working in a high-concurrency environment with strict performance budgets.

title: Android Developer (Kotlin)
description: Help us build the ultimate travel companion app. We use Kotlin, Coroutines, and Jetpack Compose. You will integrate Google Maps API and local storage solutions for offline map access. Looking for someone who cares about animations and a smooth user experience.

title: Financial Controller
description: GreenEnergy Corp is a leader in wind farm management. We need a Financial Controller to oversee our Irish operations. Responsibilities include statutory reporting, tax compliance, and managing the annual audit. Must be a qualified accountant (ACA/ACCA/CIMA) with 5+ years PQE.

title: Sales Development Representative
description: CloudScale is looking for an energetic SDR to fuel our sales pipeline. You will be responsible for outbound prospecting via email, LinkedIn, and cold calling. We offer a competitive base salary plus uncapped commission. Excellent communication skills and a 'hunter' mentality are essential.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Work on computer vision models for autonomous delivery drones. You will implement and train CNNs and Vision Transformers using TensorFlow or PyTorch. Experience with C++ and deploying models to edge devices (NVIDIA Jetson) is highly desirable.

title: Technical Writer
description: DevDoc provides documentation-as-a-service. We need a technical writer to create API references and tutorials for developer-facing products. You must be able to read code (JS/Python) and explain complex concepts simply. Experience with Markdown and Git-based workflows is required.

title: Product Manager (E-commerce)
description: SwiftCart is looking for a PM to own the checkout and payments experience. You will work with engineering and design to reduce friction and increase conversion. Data-driven mindset (A/B testing, SQL) and experience in the e-commerce space are mandatory.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description: Ensure our global infrastructure is always available and performing. You'll handle incident response, participate in an on-call rotation, and write automation scripts to eliminate manual toil. Proficiency with Prometheus, Grafana, and Kubernetes is a must.
